subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: For decades, country clubs across America have closed on Mondays, largely for maintenance work. At Sleepy Hollow Country Club in Scarborough, N.Y., that means the caddies are allowed to play the holes they walk all week.
snippet: For decades, country clubs across America have closed on Mondays, largely for maintenance work. At Sleepy Hollow Country Club in Scarborough, N.Y., that means the caddies are allowed to play the holes they walk all week.
